lyric:
[by:小陀螺Tony]
[ti:Samsara]
[ar:Tungevaag Raaban 33291435]
[al:]
[by:九九Lrc歌词网～www.99Lrc.net]
[00:04.13]Time's running up, tick tock
[00:07.87]And I'm set on minely a thread of life
[00:11.50]Do you believe in karma?
[00:15.37]Let's live it up like Samsara
[00:18.50]
[00:18.90]Someone might tell you life is deadly
[00:23.00]But with us it's just one of many
[00:26.69]Come on, let us set the tone
[00:30.69]Follow the rave, let's get it on
[00:33.97]
[00:34.17]Take me home to Samsara, Samsara
[00:37.71]Lose control like Samsara, Samsara
[00:41.01]Come join us, we'll make it
[00:42.62]Come join us, we'll take it
[00:44.69]Take me home to Samsara, Samsara
[00:47.99]
[00:50.16]Oooh...
[00:52.64]Home to Samsara, Samsara
[00:57.91]Oooh...
[01:00.19]Home to Samsara, Samsara
[01:02.22]
[01:06.53](Samsara)
[01:07.23]
[01:48.55]Don't waste your time, tick tock
[01:52.30]Spend eternity on these wheels of life
[01:56.04]Take a trip to Nirvana
[01:59.28]Let's live it up like Samsara
[02:03.32]Someone might tell you life is deadly
[02:07.37]But with us it's just one of many
[02:11.16]Come on, let us set the tone
[02:14.66]Follow the rave, let's get it on
[02:17.99]
[02:18.44]Take me home to Samsara, Samsara
[02:22.03]Lose control like Samsara, Samsara
[02:25.43]Come join us, we'll make it
[02:27.04]Come join us, we'll take it
[02:29.52]Take me home to Samsara, Samsara
[02:32.91]
[02:34.94](Samsara)
[02:43.54]
tlyric:
[by:Bella飞屋环游记]
[00:04.13]时间将尽，时钟滴答
[00:07.87]我细细规划了自己的人生
[00:11.50]你相信因缘吗
[00:15.37]让我们狂欢一场，就像轮回
[00:18.90]也许有人告诉你，生命如同死水
[00:23.00]但与我们相伴，消沉不是唯一
[00:26.69]来吧，让我们定好基调
[00:30.69]伴着音乐，兴奋起来
[00:34.17]带我回家，进入轮回
[00:37.71]别再拘束，就像轮回
[00:41.01]来加入我们吧，我们能成功
[00:42.62]来加入我们吧，我们会接受
[00:44.69]带我回家，进入轮回
[00:50.16]哦
[00:52.64]进入轮回
[00:57.91]哦
[01:00.19]进入轮回
[01:06.53]轮回
[01:48.55]别浪费你的时间，时钟正滴答滴答
[01:52.30]在轮回中经历永恒
[01:56.04]启程去涅槃
[01:59.28]让我们狂欢一场，就像轮回
[02:03.32]也许有人告诉你，生命如同死水
[02:07.37]但与我们相伴，消沉不是唯一
[02:11.16]来吧，让我们定好基调
[02:14.66]伴着音乐，兴奋起来
[02:18.44]带我回家，进入轮回
[02:22.03]别再拘束，就像轮回
[02:25.43]来加入我们吧，我们能成功
[02:27.04]来加入我们吧，我们会接受
[02:29.52]带我回家，进入轮回
[02:34.94]轮回
